13.1a.definition: where the programmer includes the definition in the program

13.1b.definition: a data type defined without reference to another data type
a non-composite user-defined data type for which the definition identifies all possible values
one for which the value is the address in memory of a different variable

13.1c.definition: a collection of data items that lacks any structure; contains no duplicates and has a number of defined operations that can be performed on it
a collection of fields containing data values
a file designed for storing data to be used by a computer program
